xxl.core.comparators

Class Comparators

  • java.lang.Object
    • xxl.core.comparators.Comparators

  • public class Comparators
extends Object
    This class provides some useful static methods for dealing with comparators.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> Comparator<Object> getObjectComparator(Comparator<T> comparator)
      Returns a comparator that is able to compare objects based on the given comparator.

      static <T> Comparator<T> newNullSensitiveComparator(Comparator<T> comparator, boolean flag)
      Returns a comparator able to handle null values.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getObjectComparator

        public static <T> Comparator<Object> getObjectComparator(Comparator<T> comparator)
        Returns a comparator that is able to compare objects based on the given comparator. Internally the returned comparator casted the objects to be compared to the type expected by the given comparator. Therefore the returned comparator will cause a ClasscastException when its methods are called with object that do not have the expected type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the objects to be compared.
        Parameters:
        comparator - the comparator that is used to compare the objects internally.
        Returns:
        a comparator that is able to compare objects based on the given comparator.

      • newNullSensitiveComparator

        public static <T> Comparator<T> newNullSensitiveComparator(Comparator<T> comparator,
                                                           boolean flag)
        Returns a comparator able to handle null values. A flag controls the position of null values concerning the induced ordering of the given comparator. If the flag is true the null values will be positioned before all other values and vice versa.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the object to be compared.
        Parameters:
        comparator - internally used comparator for objects that are not null.
        flag - determines the position of null values.
        Returns:
        a comparator able to handle null values.

      • newNullSensitiveComparator

        public static <T> Comparator<T> newNullSensitiveComparator(Comparator<T> c)
        Returns a comparator able to handle null values. Null values will be positioned before all other values.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the object to be compared.
        Parameters:
        c - internally used comparator for objects that are not null
        Returns:
        a comparator able to handle null values.
